question: Which genes predict sensitivity to C646 in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('C646')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('C646'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('C646')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes confer sensitivity to Datopotamab Deruxtecan Regimen in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Datopotamab Deruxtecan Regimen')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Datopotamab Deruxtecan Regimen'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Datopotamab Deruxtecan Regimen')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ceritinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,

  disease_name,
  pmids

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MEK Inhibitor REC-4881'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('MEK Inhibitor REC-4881')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Skin Melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sunitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sunitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sunitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Thymus Squamous Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with sensitivity to Alpelisib in Stomach Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Alpelisib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Alpelisib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alpelisib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Stomach Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are sensitivity biomarkers for Erlotinib in Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Pancreatic Adenocarcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nintedanib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nintedanib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('PLX4720')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PLX4720'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('PLX4720')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trastuzumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trastuzumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Colorectal')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with sensitivity to Olaparib in Acute Myeloid Leukemia.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Olaparib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Olaparib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Olaparib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Acute Myeloid Leukemia')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('JSI-124')
)

OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGF/VEGF Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor, PD173074'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('FGF/VEGF Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor, PD173074')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Sarcoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Olaparib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Olaparib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Brain Glioma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes confer sensitivity to Fedratinib in Polycythemia Vera?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (

)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Polycythemia Vera')

RETURN

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bevacizumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bevacizumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Ovarian Serous Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict sensitivity to Crizotinib in Inflammatory Myofibroblastic Tumor?

RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Chemotherapy')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Small Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100
